sentences.en: Agricultural soils are the ultimate recipient and depository of most applied foliar and soil pesticides.
sentences.cn: 喷撒于叶面和用于土壤的农药大多以农业土壤为其最终受体和贮存场所.

sentences.en: Article 369 Place and Manner of Safekeeping The depository shall with due care.
sentences.cn: 第三百六十九条保管人应当妥善保管保管物.

sentences.en: At this time, with one bound, the Buddhist monk jumped from the sutra depository resolutely.
sentences.cn: 禅师纵身一跳, 毅然从藏经阁上跳下.
集中登记保管 ( 系统 )

sentences.en: Depository institutions must hold reserves in the form vault cash or deposits with Federal Reserve Banks.
sentences.cn: 存款机构必须以库存现金形式或存款形式在美联储银行拥有储备金.

sentences.en: The Central Depository Bank for Securities . Germany's central securities depository and clearing agent.
sentences.cn: 为德国的证券集中保管与结算机构.

sentences.en: The depositor shall pay the safekeeping fee to the depository in accordance with the contract.
sentences.cn: 第三百六十六条寄存人应当按照约定向保管人支付保管费.

sentences.en: There are many scriptures in the sutra depository.
sentences.cn: 藏经楼里收藏着很多重要的经卷.

sentences.en: They have 2,500 tons of paper stored in their depository.
sentences.cn: 他们有2,500吨纸存放在仓库里。

sentences.en: Where the depository keeps money deposit, it may return money of the same type and quantity.
sentences.cn: 第三百七十八条保管人保管货币的, 可以返还相同种类、数量的货币.

words.tran_cn: 受托人；受托公司；储藏所

trans.tran_en: a place where something can be safely kept
